name: hipsterstack
author: Moritz Stefaner, Dominikus Baur
browserslist: last 2 Firefox versions, last 2 Chrome versions, last 2 Edge versions, last 2 Safari versions

scripts.build: rm -rf build; parcel build ./src/index.html --out-dir build --public-url ./; open build
scripts.deploy-preview: rm -rf build; npm run build; cp -R build $npm_package_version; scp -r $npm_package_version $npm_package_staging_server_path/$npm_package_staging_server_directory/; rm -rf $npm_package_version; echo Uploaded to $npm_package_staging_server_URL/$npm_package_staging_server_directory/$npm_package_version; echo $npm_package_staging_server_URL/$npm_package_staging_server_directory/$npm_package_version | pbcopy
